channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: CBS 'Evening News' anchor John Dickerson is leaving the network
item.description: Veteran journalist John Dickerson is bidding farewell to CBS by the end of the year.

item.title: Trump won't meet Canadian PM Mark Carney during Asia trip, despite trade progress with others
item.description: President Trump's biggest trade fight is close to home and with the unlikeliest of foes.

item.title: Donald Trump Has Broken the Progressive Ratchet
item.description: His changes will be difficult to reverse.

item.title: Minnesota man with anarchist ties, violent past charged with putting out $45,000 hit on Bondi

item.title: Indiana Governor Calls Special Session To Redraw Congressional Maps
item.description: 'If Indiana doesn’t act like it wants to win, it shouldn't be surprised when it loses,' said Indiana state Sen. Liz Brown, a supporter of redistrictin...

item.title: Shutdown halts billions in small business loans, government contracts, SBA administrator says
item.description: Smaller companies across America have lost access to capital because of the government shutdown and those with federal contracts have received "stop w...

item.title: Celebrating Bill Buckley — and the Majesty of Our Nation’s Founding
item.description: The pursuit of freedom is the route to happiness.

item.title: Seven Pennsylvania Election Canvassers Charged For Fake Voter Registration Scheme In 2024 Election
item.description: Temp workers with criminal backgrounds are not the right people to handle voter registration information like Social Security numbers.

item.title: Trump-allied think tank creates toolkit for students to launch right-wing groups on campus
item.description: The conservative America First Policy Institute has a toolkit for students facing viewpoint discrimination on campus.

item.title: So Much for Diversity
item.description: A leading union of academic professionals is taking a stand — for ideological conformity.

item.title: Pennsylvania Department Of Education Touts ‘Media Literacy’ For Kids While Pushing Left-Wing Sources
item.description: PDE's efforts to help kids navigate various sources is weakened by ideological taint, but it is doomed by a rejection of absolute truth.

item.title: Mamdani: The Real Victim Of 9/11 Was My Muslim Aunt

item.title: U.N.’s Global Carbon Tax Should Be a Wake-Up Call to Fight International Climate Extremism
item.description: The United States should take necessary action to kill off the IMO global carbon tax.

item.title: If Trump Doesn’t Want to Be Impeached, He Should Stop Doing Impeachable Things
item.description: The administration should stop handing ammunition to its opponents.

item.title: ‘Without Him, I’m Nothing’: NFL Quarterbacks Glorify Christ In Week 8 Matchups
